name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Sister Returned
text: Power Action - Spend 1 resource or spot another witch to roll a weapon die on this character into your pool.

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Makashi Master
text: After you remove, turn, or resolve one or more of an opponent's character dice, deal 1 damage to each opponent's character whose dice you just manipulated. "The Sith control everything, You just don't know it."

name: Nightsister Acolyte
text: Action - Play a card from your hand that costs an odd number to reroll a die. "When you face one Nightsister of Dathomir... you face us all!" - Merrin

name: Ren
subtitle: Alluring Ideologue
text: After this character takes damage for the first time each round, you may discard a card from your hand to roll a set-aside Servant of the Darkside (EAW9) die into your pool.

name: Influence
text: Action - Spot a witch and exhaust this downgrade to force an opponent to either remove an attached character's character die or have you gain 1 resource.

name: Expunge Weakness
text: Spot a Blue character to remove one of your dice showing a blank. Then remove an opponent's die.

name: Through Power, Gain Strength
text: Remove a die. Then you may resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 2.

name: Vile Machinations
text: You may spot a Yellow character to remove a die not showing damage. You may spot a Blue character to turn a die showing damage to a side showing a blank.

name: Asajj's Ginivex-Class Starfighter
text: Power Action - Spot Asajj Ventress to roll one of her character dice into your pool.

name: Force Concealment
text: After you turn or remove an opponent's die, place 1 resource on this support. Action - Discard this support to play a Blue ability or Blue event, decreasing its cost by the number of resources on this support, up to a maximum of 3.

name: Asajj's Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on a Blue character, you may spend 1 resource to make this upgrade elite.
While this upgrade is on Asajj Ventress, decrease this die's costs by 1.

name: Dark Rage
text:
Blue character only.
While attached character has 6 or more damage on it, increase this die's value by 1, or by 2 instead if attached character has 9 or more damage on it.

name: Deny Death
text: Before attached character would be defeated, instead discard one of your Blue abilities to heal damage equal to that ability's cost from this attached character. Discard this upgrade.

name: Sith Master
text: Sith character only. After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing a blank. Power Action - Roll a character or upgrade die on the attached character into your pool.

name: Water Of Life
text: [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character. Spot a witch to reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Droideka
text:
After setup, give this character 1 shield.
While this character has 1 or more shields, increase the value of its character dice by 1.
While this character has no shields, increase damage dealt to this character by 1.

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Kaleesh Warlord
text: Before you resolve this die showing focus, you may increase its value by 1. If you do, its effect can only turn droid dice. Power Action - Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to roll a droid die on a card you control into your pool.

name: Iden Versio
subtitle: Imperial Ace
text: You may include Iden Versio on a team that also includes a Red hero leader. Piloting. While this die is in your pool, increase the value of your piloted vehicle dice by 1.

name: Tarkin
subtitle: Uncompromising Tactician
text: Power Action - Reveal an opponent's hand. You may discard a card from your hand to discard a card of your choice from that opponent's hand with the same cost. "Charming. To the last."

name: Inhibitor Chip
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to place 1 resource on it. Then, If this card has 2 or more resources on it, force an opponent to remove one of attached character's character dice. Then roll that die into your pool.

name: At All Costs
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a cost.

name: Casualties Of War
text: Set aside a card from a discard pile to remove a die with a value equal to that card's cost.

name: Defensive Effort
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent and spot up to 2 Red characters to remove that many dice showing damage.

name: Good Soldiers Follow Orders
text: Turn a trooper die to any side. Then, if it was your die, you may spot a Blue character to resolve it.

name: Crucial Intel
text: Team Up 1: Each leader. After a card is discarded from an opponent's hand by a card effect, place 1 resource on this plot. Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this plot to gain 2 actions.

name: Armored Assault Tank
text: Power Action - Spot a leader to roll this die into your pool. "A fearsome sight on any battlefield, the AAT is one of the Trade Federation's most formidable weapons." - Captain Panaka

name: Separatist Supply Ship
text: Action - Exhaust this support to play a Red support with a matching die from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Tactical Droid
text: Power Action - Resolve a die showing a cost. Then turn one of your dice to a side showing a different symbol than that die. "I assure you he will succeed where you have failed." - Count Dooku

name: Uncompromising
text: While this upgrade is on a leader, it gains Redeploy. After you resolve this die, look at an opponent's hand and discard the card from it with the lowest cost (you choose in the case of a tie).

name: Aurra Sing
subtitle: Merciless Hunter
text: Action - Remove one of your dice to resolve one of this character's character dice, increasing its value by 1. "I never ask for permission to do anything, my darling."

name: Bossk
subtitle: Apex Predator
text: Piloting. Power Action - Move up to 2 damage from an opponent's character to another character.

name: Death Watch Mandalorian
text: While you control a leader, this character has Guardian. After you remove this die, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Pre Vizsla
subtitle: Death Watch Commander
text: After setup, play a set-aside copy of Darksaber (HS103) on this character for free. Power Action - Remove one of your dice to give this character 1 shield.

name: Data Heist
text: Play only if you spot a spy or a bounty hunter. After attached character is defeated, reveal the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck. You may play a card revealed for free, spotting that opponent's cards as if they were yours.

name: Alternative Methods
text: Spot a bounty hunter to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the difference in the number of cards in your hands, to a maximum of 5.

name: For Mandalore!
text: Remove a character or upgrade die. Then roll one of your elite character's character or upgrade dice into your pool.

name: Lawless
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's die. Then force an opponent to choose and remove their dice until they have 3 or fewer dice in their pool.

name: Trick
text: Spot a Yellow character and reveal a card from your hand to force an opponent to remove one of their dice showing a value equal to the cost of the revealed card.

name: Hunt And Eliminate
text: Include only if each character on your team is a unique bounty hunter. After you deal damage to a character with a bounty on it, exhaust this plot to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.

name: Black Stall Station
text:
After you remove one or more of your dice, you may spot a Yellow character to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
A renowned hideout by Bounty Hunters with an elite security system.

name: Gauntlet Fighter
text:
Ambush.
After you activate this support, you may remove one of your other dice to resolve this die.

name: Cad Bane's Ll-30
text:
After you play this upgrade on Cad Bane, you may spend 1 resource to make this upgrade elite.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Modified Relby V-10
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to roll this die into your pool.

name: Vicious Tactics
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a cost, increasing its value by the cost showing on it.

name: Elite Mercenary
text:
The X on this die is equal to the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 3.
If you want the best, you're going to need the credits.

name: Chirrut Imwe
subtitle: Spiritual Warrior
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. Power Action - Turn one of your character dice showing a blank to a side with a value of 1, or to any side instead if you spot Baze Malbus.

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Fearsome Duelist
text: Damage dealt by this die is unblockable. Power Action - Resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage. If a character is defeated this way, you may return that die to your pool showing the same side and resolve it again for free.

name: Patient Padawan
text:
After you resolve this die showing a shield, you may discard the top card of a deck.
"Pass on what you have learned. Strength. Mastery. But weakness, folly, failure also." - Yoda

name: Plo Koon
subtitle: Jedi Ace
text: Piloting. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from one of your pilots to play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: As The Force Wills It
text:
Renew 1.
Spot a Blue character to choose a die showing a blank. That die cannot be rerolled this round.

name: Deep Meditation
text: Turn an opponent's die to any side. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Echo Three To Echo Seven
text:
Choose a character die. Turn another character die to a side showing the same symbol and value as that die. Then spot a Yellow character to give a character 1 shield.
"Han old buddy, do you read me?" - Luke Skywalker

name: Fear Nothing
text:
Renew 1.
Give a Blue character 1 shield. If this card was played using its renew cost, draw a card.

name: I Don't Need Luck
text: Spot 2 of your dice showing a blank to turn each of those dice to any side.

name: I Have You
text: Activate 2 of your characters that do not share a color. Then give one of those characters 2 shields.

name: Restore
text:
Renew 1.
Remove one of your Blue character dice to heal 2 damage from that character.

name: Plo Koon's Starfighter
text: After this support is piloted for the first time each round, you may give 1 shield to a Red character, or if it is piloted by Plo Koon, you may give 1 shield to any character instead.

name: Sentinel Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may give a character 1 shield.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of your dice showing a shield without removing it from your pool. Reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Yoda's Teachings
text:
Play only if you spot a Blue character.
[special] - Choose and do 2 of the following:
-Gain 1 resource.
-Give a character 1 shield.
-Discard the top card of a deck
-Turn one of your dice to any side.

name: Baze Malbus
subtitle: Devoted Guardian
text: Guardian. Power Action - Spend 1 resource or spot Chirrut Imwe to resolve one of your dice showing a modifier as if it did not have a modifier.

name: Cody
subtitle: Ardent Commander
text: After the start of the round or when the battlefield changes control, if you control the battlefield, draw a card. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to turn a trooper die to any side.

name: Republic Senator
text: Power Action - Play an event from your hand to discard a random card from an opponent's hand. "There is no civility. Only politics." - Sheev Palpatine

name: Rex
subtitle: Bastion Of The Republic
text: After the first time you play a Red weapon, equipment, or vehicle this round, you may take control of the battlefield. "This war left its scars on all of us."

name: Hold The Line
text:
Play only if an opponent has more dice in their pool than you have in yours.
Remove an opponent's die.

name: Maintain Position
text: Give up to 2 of your characters 1 shield each. If you have a copy of Hold the Line (SETREF) in your discard pile, you may give control of the battlefield to an opponent to give up to 2 of your characters 1 shield each.

name: This Is War!
text: Spot a Blue character and activate one of your Red characters to remove a die not showing damage with a value of 1 or less.

name: At-Te
text: Power Action - Resolve this die, rerolling it instead of removing it. [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters

name: The Bad Batch
text: After you activate this support, choose and do one of the following. If you spot a leader, you can choose and do one of the following again: -Roll 1 set-aside Clone Trooper (LEG38) die into your pool -Roll 1 set-aside Rebel Engineer (ATG75) die into your pool.

name: Dc-15a Blaster Carbine
text: Action - Return this upgrade to your hand to use a claim ability or power action on the battlefield, even if it has been used this round.

name: Medpack
text: After attached character is activated, heal 1 damage from a character, or 2 damage instead if that character has 11 or more damage on it.

name: Meebur Gascon
text: Modify droid character or support. Power Action - Resolve one of your droid dice as if it were showing a different symbol.

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Rightful Ruler
text: Power Action - Choose an opponent's die showing damage and force them to resolve it. Then you may resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1. [special] - Deal 3 unblockable indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Padme Amidala
subtitle: Political Idealist
text: Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this card to play a set-aside Diplomatic Immunity (AWK 50) for free. [special] - Discard the top 2 cards of a deck. Place 1 resource on this card.

name: Rebel Smuggler
text: Piloting. After you resolve a vehicle die piloted by this character for the first time each round, gain 1 resource.

name: Zeb Orrelios
subtitle: Honorable Warrior
text:
After you resolve this die showing damage, you may draw a card.
"Karabast!"

name: A Gift
text:
Play a support with a matching die from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Choose an opponent. That opponent may roll that support's die into their pool.
"Both are hard working, and will serve you well." - Luke Skywalker

name: Strike A Deal
text: Remove a die showing a value of 1 or more. Then each opponent gains resources equal to half that die's value rounded up.

name: Swift
text: Gain 2 actions. You cannot take the resolve dice action this turn.

name: Defiant Uprising
text: After you activate a Blue or Red character, you may activate this support.

name: Mandalorian Vault
text: Discard this support if it has 2 or more damage on it. Action - Spot a Blue character, exhaust this support and place 1 damage on it to remove a character die.

name: New Base
text: Action - Exhaust this support to turn a die to a side showing the same symbol as another die showing a modifier.

name: Partisan Recruit
text:
You may distribute indirect damage dealt to yourself to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.

name: Xs Freighter
text:
Before this support becomes activated by Piloting, you may search your deck for a mod and play it on this support, if able, decreasing its cost by 1.
Shuffle your deck. [special] - Roll a die on an attached mod into your pool.

name: Smuggling Compartment
text: Modify vehicle support. Attached vehicle's support and upgrade dice cannot be removed while they are showing a resource.

name: Unlikely Heroes
text: You can only include non-unique characters on your team.

name: Bb-8
text:
After you play this support, you may spend 1 resource to make it elite.
[special] - Gain 1 resource and draw a card.

name: Chirrut's Staff
text: After you play this upgrade, you may reroll a die showing a blank, or turn it to any side instead if this upgrade is on Chirrut Imwe.

name: Bendu's Foresight
text: Choose a number. Reroll a die. If that die's value is the chosen number, remove it. Otherwise, you can repeat this effect once.

name: Grow Beyond
text: Renew 2. Spot a Jedi or Sith character to play a Blue ability from your discard pile onto another character, decreasing its cost by 1. If this card was played using its renew cost, roll that ability's die into your pool.

name: Hawk-Bat Swoop
text: Resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing a shield as melee damage, increasing its value by the number of shields on the attached character, if it has an upgrade titled Ataru Mastery on it.

name: Saber Swarm
text: Resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing melee damage to remove a die. If that resolved die belongs to a character that has an upgrade titled Ataru Mastery on it, give it 2 shields.

name: Path To Mastery
text: After setup, set this plot aside to play a set-aside upgrade with "Training" in its title on one of your characters, decreasing its cost by 1, if able.

name: Ataru Mastery
text:
Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character.
After you play this upgrade, give a character 2 shields.
[special] - Give a character 2 shields. Deal damage equal to the number of shields on that character to a character.

name: Ataru Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give a character 1 shield. Deal damage equal to half the number of shields on that character, rounded up to a character. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Ataru Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.

name: Palace Of The Jedi
subtitle: Coruscant
text: After you take control of this battlefield, remove its die. Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. [special] - Move 1 damage from a character to another character.

name: I Am No Jedi
text: Spot a Blue character to resolve a Red die as if it were showing a different symbol. Spot a Red character to draw a card.

name: Ace Pilots
text: Team Up 1: Each unique pilot Action - Set this plot aside and spend resources equal to the cost of a unique vehicle in play to make it elite (place a second copy of its die on it).

name: The Mission That Never Ends
text: Team Up 1: Each trooper After one of your trooper characters is defeated, set this plot aside to roll that character's character dice into your pool. You may resolve those dice, if able. Otherwise, remove them.

name: Security Droid
text: After you resolve this die showing damage, you may spend 1 resource to remove a die showing damage.

name: Deflector Shield
text: Modify vehicle support. Before attached vehicle would be discarded from play, discard this upgrade from play instead. After you activate attached support, give a character 1 shield.

name: Utility Belt
text: Attached character has +1 upgrade limit.

name: Tipoca City
subtitle: Kamino
text: Power Action - Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it. Claim - Reroll an opponent's die. Then you may force them to resolve it, if able.

name: Fennec Shand
subtitle: Adept Mercenary
text: After you play a Yellow event, you may reroll one of your dice. Power Action - Reroll a weapon die. Then, if that die is showing damage, deal 1 damage to a character. Otherwise, give this character 1 shield.

name: Tracked Target
text: Play only if you spot a bounty hunter. After attached character is activated or defeated, you may draw a card.

name: Black Market Connection
text: If there is another copy of this card in your discard pile, search your deck for an upgrade and play it, decreasing its cost by 3. If you searched your deck, shuffle it. Then set aside all copies of this card in your discard pile and set this card aside.

name: Complicated Profession
text: Spot a bounty hunter and a bounty to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less. Gain 1 resource. "Bounty hunting is a complicated profession. Wouldn't you agree?" - The Client

name: Greed
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove one of your dice. Then gain 1 resource. Spot a Red character to take one additional action.

name: Bo-Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
You may resolve the damage sides of this die as if they were ranged damage.

name: Undercity
subtitle: Coruscant
text: Power Action - Draw a card. Then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Claim - Draw a card.

name: Hold Fast
text: Remove one of your non-unique character dice to remove a die.

name: Unique Perspectives
text: Spot 2 characters that share a subtype and not a color to deal 2 damage to a character. Spot 2 characters that share a color and no subtypes to heal 2 damage from a character.

name: Gozanti Cruiser
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice showing a shield to discard a random card from an opponent's hand.

name: Z-95
text: Before you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage to yourself. Action - Discard 2 cards from your hand to take control of this support. Any player may use this action.

name: Ee-3 Carbine Rifle
text: While this upgrade is on a bounty hunter or trooper, it gains Redeploy. Power Action - Remove this die showing damage to deal 3 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: High Valley
subtitle: Ryloth
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your non-unique character dice, increasing its value by 1.
